oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Form No. 40, special requisition for the 30th Tennessee Volunteers in Dalton, Georgia
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law. Users are solely responsible for determining the existence of such instances and for obtaining any other permissions and paying associated fees that may be necessary for the intended use.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: United States -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; Tennessee -- History -- Civil War, 1861-1865; Confederate States of America -- Quartermaster General's Office
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Special requisition form requesting 2 blankets, 4 hats, 9 jackets, 17 shirts, 9 pairs of pants, 12 drawers, 5 pairs of shoes, 2 pairs of socks, 1 camp kettle, 3 mess pans, 1 tin cup, 1 wooden bucket, and paper. Issued to Captain Hibbitt of the 30th Tennessee Volunteers by Quartermaster Captain S. R. Simpson.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Confederate States of America -- Quartermaster General's Office
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Quartermaster of the Army provides logistical support to the combat troops in the form of ammunition, clothing, food, and pay.
